thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com
thread.title: Nicole

author: Nicole
title: Nicole
text: Topcashback has a HUGE list of retailers that they work with - you can get cash back on almost anything you buy online. When I had a problem getting paid by a major retailer they stepped in and had it all worked out by the next day, just a week or so before Christmas! I have had nothing but positive experiences here, gotten every penny due. Pretty much every major retailer online can be accessed here and tons of niche retailers as well. I am not versed on every cash back operation out there, but the ones I have compared have not offered as much cash back on ANY of the items I purchased. I can't say enough about this company - they are the best as far as my experience goes.
